name: split_penalty
attributes: # [doc = " ペナルティプールから二名の正常ユーザーへ均等分配"]
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . admin . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;
let vault_info = ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () ;
* * ctx . accounts . user_a . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += half ;
msg ! ("Sent {} lamports to {}" , half , ctx . accounts . user_a . key ()) ;
* * ctx . accounts . user_b . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += remainder ;
msg ! ("Sent {} lamports to {}" , remainder , ctx . accounts . user_b . key ()) ;

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 罰金トークン保管用PDA"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"penalty_vault"] , bump)]

fields.name: user_a
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 正常ユーザーA（署名不要）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user_b
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 正常ユーザーB（署名不要）"] # [account (mut)]
